projects.title: WeathAir
projects.description: NOAA NWS Airport Weather data, served beautifully. A web application that provides access to National Weather Service airport weather data with an intuitive and attractive interface.

projects.title: India Weather REST API
projects.description: A RESTful API to access weather data from the India Meteorological Department. Built to solve the challenge of accessing IMD weather data which is notoriously difficult to obtain through official channels.

projects.title: Alli: Chomp Away Bad Habits
projects.description: A habit-tracking application developed at the University of Florida. Helps users build positive habits and break negative ones through an engaging and interactive interface.

projects.title: Voyager
projects.description: Personal project. Voyager is a travel itinerary visualizer. Simply set your home city and start adding destinations to see them on a beautifully crafted map - a way to remember all your travels!
